citeinfo.origin: Japan Coast Guard, Hydrographic and Oceanographic Department, Japan Oceanographic Data Center (JODC)
citeinfo.title: Sea Level Heights - Japan - 1961 to Present

descript.abstract:
This data file contains hourly value of sea level derived from tide gauge observations, which were conducted by Japan Cast Guard, Japan Meteorological Agency and Hokkaido Development Agency, and also contains the observation data at Showa Station of Antarctica.
[ A TCODE project ]
descript.purpose: Archive and service as National Oceanographic Data Center in Japan.

idinfo.accconst: These data are NOT included in the holdings of the Permanent Service for Mean Sea Level in Bidston.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
